inputs.prompt: Professional studio product photography of a pristine white Adidas Samba sneaker from image 1, positioned at a dynamic three-quarter angle. The lighting is dramatic and cool-toned, featuring a hard spotlight that creates a glowing halo effect on the ground while casting soft shadows. The background is a seamless, clean gradient transitioning from a light silver-gray top to a deep anthracite black floor. Minimal composition with generous negative space, shot with shallow depth of field (f/2.8) to emphasize product details while softly blurring the background.

_meta.title: Detailed Texture Vid - MiniMax Hailuo Video

inputs.prompt_text: Product video — camera slowly zooms toward the sneaker, revealing texture details, light reflecting on the leather surface, cinematic shallow depth of field

_meta.title: Cinematic Pan Vid - MiniMax Hailuo Video

inputs.prompt_text: Product video — camera pans across the sneaker from heel to toe, dramatic cinematic light sweeps across, dust motes floating in the air
Product video — 360° rotating hero showcase of a white leather sneaker, cinematic soft spotlight, minimal studio background, seamless loop.
